name: The Eternal Travelers: Origins
description:
The Eternal Travelers: Origins is an epic, open-world single-player adventure RPG.

In The Eternal Travelers: Origins you play as Richard, knight of The Shields who’s been sent on a mission to investigate some unusual circumstances on the Brigthshore Island.

Featuring stunning 3D graphics, open-world gameplay, and an incredible level of detail and interactivity, The Eternal Travelers: Origins offers a gameplay experience like no other.

Key features:

  • Fully 3D environment
  • Up to 6 hours of gameplay
  • Many quests and rich dialogues
  • Explore the forests, caves, towns
  • Fight bandits and skeletons
  • Wear unique armors and carry epic weapons

Attribution:
